scripts.build: npm run build:en && npm run build:es
scripts.build:en: npx resume export --format html --theme kwan --resume resume.json dist/resume.html
scripts.build:es: npx resume export --format html --theme kwan --resume resume_es.json dist/resume_es.html
scripts.build-pdf: npm run build-pdf:en && npm run build-pdf:es
scripts.build-pdf:en: npx resume export --format pdf --theme kwan --resume resume.json dist/resume.pdf
scripts.build-pdf:es: npx resume export --format pdf --theme kwan --resume resume_es.json dist/resume_es.pdf
